title: IWCQ Day 1 Situation
body:
**Update 2: Looks like the games tonight are being moved 2 hours earlier (5pm AEST). These games will be the 6 that were not played yesterday. Will look at updating once we receive locked in date and time for the games scheduled for tonight.**

Hey team,

We're really sorry about the delays tonight.

The situation is that there will not be further games today, and the Chiefs vs Bangkok Titans game will need to be remade on another day.

Right now I am working to get further information including the revised schedule for the tournament soon.

replies.body:
So the Chiefs came in and rek't BKT with some early game plays (also on a macro level, bad pcs/lag doesnt make any difference in this case) and there's going to be a remake. I think i speak for all of OCE when i say this is utter horse shit. Giving BKT a do-over it absolutely pathetic, and i for one am going to be really pissed if BKT win that match.

Edit: Doesn't matter.
Chiefs #1!

Can we talk about this?

https://twitter.com/Swip3rR/status/636504452703330304 
https://twitter.com/Chief_Sangy/status/636504883391299585


I personally think its abit obnoxious and non-sportsmanlike behaviour.

they knew they got a **"get out of jail free card"** and i think its absolutely absurd.

I honestly think you need to reconsider where you host, and how its handled. i feel really let down by the lack of effort on riot turkey's part.
they have had massive disruptions this year and have really (to be frank) F^cked up alot of broadcasts.


Please consider moving the wildcard tournament to another region.

EDIT: was referring to BKT laughing.

Non-sportsmanlike behaviour? 
I'd be the same if my team was winning and the game ended up being postponed with the other team laughing..
i think the non-sportsmanlike behaviour he was talking about was BKT laughing after the game was called off.
bkt should have to ff
Correct
I'm sorry for misunderstanding but I'm all in favour of that..
It's cool mate, don't stress

Would be interesting to get official confirmation that BKT weren't invovled in on the decision to remake the Match before the 20 min mark. As per Riot Benji, if the match went past 20 mins, Chiefs would have been awarded the win.

_"The game did not reach 20 minutes which is one of the requirements for an awarded game victory, you can check the 'Awarded Game Victory' section in most Riot Rulesets for more information on this"_ - Riot Benji @ Reddit

Yes, this is really unfortunate for the Chiefs since they had such a good start, but please everyone remember that doesn't matter how much you do or what level of infrastructure you have, shit happens. It was obvious from the very long pause timers that Riot did not want to force the players to remake the game. It's clear they were doing everything in their power to continue that one game, but in the end were unable to save it.

Right now, none of us should be saying how crap the situation is, because that can't change. We should all be screaming as loud as we can to show the world that OCE is here and Chiefs will be making it to Worlds. Those boys need our support.


Also mad props to those casters, they had such little material to work with, but they soldiered on like champs. They definitely deserve a fist bump.
Certainly fucked up the night to take off work. God dammit.
me too mate, and i have to work tomorrow night.....so annoyed
Likewise
So I guess the question should be - what have Riot done to prevent the same thing happening tonight ?
Ill bet money on nothing
i feel bad for the chief they rekt bangkok titan so hard with their amazing play and tactics
They did absolutely rek early game so now because the game is postponed the titans can figure out ways to counter their plays

I have faith in the chiefs to pull of the same results as they did last night.  The fact that everyone is crying about chiefs being hard done is a reflection on the attitude of the oce server that it is GG after first blood. Good luck to the chiefs, I know they have the skill and talent to win the remake.
Can you send me some of the unfounded positivity drugs your taking please they must be damn powerful.

no more game live streaming tonight?

but what about the other language's channel? can we at least watch the game maybe in Thai??

Hey mate,

The issue is on the players end, the games themselves are not happening, all of the other language broadcasts have also turned off for today. The games we missed today will be replayed on another date (which will be communicated asap).
What about the rumours of ddosing? Is there any truth to them?
Is it even possible to DDOS a Lan game?

It wasn't played on LAN, which is stupid, but it wasn't.

And yes the games were ddosed.
I always assumed every riot event was LAN hosted... How much extra work could it be to set up a small LAN connection? That just sounds like Riot Turkey are being lazy to me...
Riot Turkey is useless from what I have heard. Their own Turkish league finals also suffered from ddos also. Honestly I don't know why they couldn't just host the tournament in NA or EU LCS studio
If that's the case (ddosed), it is an easy way an make some money given you can bet on outcomes
journo leopardus on the case
Not even I just think at events of this size they should have better protection against ddosing.

As much as we hate this situation and BKT's behaviour, we need to have faith in our OCE team! Chiefs rekt BKT today, they will rekt BKT tomorrow despite the remake. Our OCErs will show the BKT what _sportsmanship_ means <3

And now the other teams have an extra day to analyse chiefs 1st 15 mins at IWC  great lol............  How Did Riot HQ not see this coming and send them a HUB.......... whats a HUB and some cat 5 cables cost ? $200 rito bankrupt ?
get rekt chiefs fanboys
Wait a second, I need to get this right. So Chiefs won the game but then there was a tech problem and that game has to be restarted?
they didn't WIN the game they were WINNING 10 kills 3 deaths 1 dragon to 0 (same number of towers down i think)

They should have kept that game paused, got the pro's to go rest till the ddosers went to bed then finished it,  not restarted it,  both ways give time for coaches to communicate and discuss ideas on information already gained,  restarting the game just gives the team behind a greater advantage of that ideas communicating time.
dam turkey technical team.

If Chiefs end up being one game off, they deserve some kind of penalty. Honestly they need something, they were about to get the first win of the tourney and a good start, riot you need to start giving a crap about things other than eu and na... You've heard it a thousand times I know but maybe that means do something? #MAKEEVERYPROGAMELAN
I don't think you mean penalty, you mean some sort of compensation.
bkt should have to forfeit, than we can laugh at them for thinking they got one up on us.

Yes it is a bad situation and Chiefs did have a huge advantage and probably would of won. I think a fair way for people who are winning and the game doesn't last 20 mins is with the restart they get a choice at the same time the original game stopped if they want to restart the game or not.

As bkt have had this advantage and so now the Chiefs have a safety net. If they do reset they don't get to do it again and if they say no they cannot change their minds later.

This means that bkt could need to win early game 2x but if the cheifs win early game they have also won 2x.
I just hope chiefs don`t pull a CLG like every other time OCE reps participate in international events. This season CLG did not pull a CLG maybe OCE reps won`t too
